text: Paul William Westhead (born February 21, 1939) is an American basketball coach. He was the head coach of the University of Oregon women's team. He was known for coaching the Los Angeles Lakers between 1979 until 1981, leading them to win the 1980 NBA Finals. Westhead was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. ==References== ==Other websites== * Oregon profile * NBA profile * BasketballReference.com: Paul Westhead Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Chicago Bulls head coaches Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles Category:Sportspeople from Oregon
title: Paul Westhead
